name: Educational How-To Template
description: A structured template for creating educational how-to content with clear step-by-step instructions
template: Did you know {hook_question}? Today I'm going to show you exactly how to {main_topic} in just {time_duration}. First, {step_1}. The key here is {key_point_1}. Next, {step_2}. This is crucial because {reason_2}. Finally, {step_3}. {final_tip}. Try this out and let me know how it worked for you in the comments!

variables.name: hook_question
variables.description: An engaging question to hook viewers at the start

variables.name: main_topic
variables.description: The main skill or topic being taught

variables.name: time_duration
variables.description: How long the tutorial will take (e.g., '5 minutes', 'under 60 seconds')

variables.name: key_point_1
variables.description: Important detail or tip for step 1

variables.name: final_tip
variables.defaultValue: Pro tip: practice this a few times to get it perfect

hooks.text: Try this out and let me know how it worked for you in the comments!
